name: Vaporeon

passive.name: Unstable Genes
passive.effect: You may treat Water Energy cards as Basic Energy cards with the type of any Pokemon with the "Unstable Genes" ability.

attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.effect: Deal 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokemon not used to pay for this attack's cost, up to 30.

flavor: A scientist wanted their Eevee to be able to swim underwater with them and gave them a water stone. Eevee reacted to this experiment in a very unexpected way.
